import React, { useState, useContext } from "react"; import { jwtDecode } from "jwt-decode"; import AuthContext from '../context/AuthContext' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import './styles/Navbar.css'; function Navbar() { const {user, logoutUser} = useContext(AuthContext) const token = localStorage.getItem("authTokens") if (token){ const decoded = jwtDecode(token) var user_id = decoded.user_id } return (
